attributes.title: worst app ever rather die 🍊🦧
attributes.review: so i wanted to download this app for the pure love of our president.  but i tried to download it and it took literally a year.  it just actually downloaded today.  so disappointed.  how could he make such an awful app when he’s so great.  i think barron should take over.  i mean he knows his way around technology he does play roblox all the time.  this app also never loaded either.  i would open it and it would crash so awful.  i don’t think there is any way to fix this i think the app just need to be deleted.  i am i’m completely awe at how bad this app is.  like how.  all i wanted to do was support my president.  i might as well die now that i can’t have the app functioning. ✨🧚🏻‍♀️😿🏳️‍🌈

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: After I downloaded this app my skin started itching like crazy. I went to the doctor and they said there was something seriously wrong. So they sent me to the ER and turns out THE APP GAVE ME RACISM!! I had to be quarantined for a month just so I wouldn’t say something rude. Then I decided to give the app a second chance I contracted STUPIDITY from the app!! If you don’t want these I suggest you delete this app. ALSO if you vote for Trump again you’re a white supremacist. You racist trash😘😳🙈✨

attributes.title: small pÊępėë cheese man
attributes.review: when opening the app i exclaimed how revoulting it was and then the secret service kicked down my door🥴😮 they proceeded to break all the plates in my house😔🍝 when i was like hey stop the refused then proceeded to steal all of my Pepsi saying "mr trump" needed them when i asked if i would b reimbursed 🤑🤑 they said no  :( this broke my heart because my dog who is dying of gonorrhea loves them and im not going to say the a man of orange color gave it to him but he did so now he has stolen my dog and his pepsi😓😔😬🍝🤮🥵💀

attributes.title: Absolutely grotesque
attributes.review:
The app takes forever to load. I am constantly bombarded with pictures of an orange cricket and news alerts on where to meet him. I got so many notifications from this app it interrupted other videos games on my phone. It’s impossible to get past level 14 on the app, and it crashes every time you go up a level. 
The treatment I have received from the development team is absolutely appalling.

attributes.title: DONT GET THIS APP NOT WORTH IT!!😡
attributes.review: i went to download this app people just like all my other white friends i wanted to support our annoying orange president🧡🧡 but when i opened the app all it kept screaming at me was “WHITE POWER WHITE POWER” “WHITE SUPREMACY” and other chants that made me jump out from my seat and fall down my 20 flights of stairs and i nearly broke every bone in my body!!😡🤬 now i’m stuck in the hospital and might die because of this app!! don’t get this app if you don’t want to die!!!!!!!

attributes.title: It’s the whole app fa me
attributes.review: Absolutely the worst app ever invented and I’m disgusted with the entire app. I mean seriously is the world a joke to thing 🍊. #thankyounext. 0/10, would not recommend. The app would not stay open and was constantly glitching. And not to mention Donald trump he is giving me very much stupid, very much racist, very much ugly, very much liar... I could go on but I have to go watch as many tiktok as possible before that joke deletes  the app. Ps: your worst nightmare💅🏽😘💖🦄🐝🧚‍♀️

attributes.title: Misleading, don’t download
attributes.review: I went to download the app because I love Cheetos, but when I went to download it I got a notification that I was entered into the hunger games 😱, I didn’t consent to that nor did it say before that I would be entered, that is misleading, not only that, but when I went to another section to complain it kept crashing, freezing, and glitching, it also drains your battery, and doesn’t work, awful app, don’t download

attributes.title: 😍Ugly orange 🥰
attributes.review: So I was on the app and saw an ugly looking orange 🤢🤮I want this app gone Because looking at the orange made me puke and have bad diarrhea🥺🤧and all I want is for this app to be gone 🥺do better 💙💙and take this ugly fat orange out he’s making everyone sick😷🤒I cant believe you guys would actually allow this app to exist 🤕😪like who does that to people😡anyways take this app out of existence because no one wants it 🤪and his stomach takes up most of the screen 😔like 🤢🤮Thx🧚🏽

attributes.title: App UI color is off - Orange Oompa Loompas
attributes.review: This app is not with the time it took to download. The color of the UI kept having an orange hue making all the photos of people appear as Oompa Loompas. I also didn’t trust the content shared in the articles.  The claims were all baseless, unable to be proven by science or experience.  This app is sad, very sad, maybe the worst app I’ve ever used and I’ve used so many apps.  I would not recommend this app to my worst enemy, or this country’s worst enemy.

attributes.title: This app is TERRIBLE! So hard to work through and waste of storage space
attributes.review: This app is horrible!!! It keeps crashing every time I open it!! And when I tried to delete and redownload, I keep having the same problem? I tried to contact customer service 4 times and 3/4 times I had no answer and when I finally reached them, they had me on hold for 37 minutes and didnt even end up helping me with the issue....
